Module com.example.c482

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
com.jpollock.c482.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the MainController class that is used to controller the Main page of the app.

    • moveToModifyProduct

      public void moveToModifyProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is used to create a Product object based off what the user selected and then send the user to the Modify Product form.
      Parameters:
      event - button click
      Throws:
      IOException - LOGICAL ERROR: In the beginning I was having an issue with getting the Associated Parts table to populate in my ModifyProductController class. The way that this issue was resolved was I needed to create a ModifyProductController object to set my loader.getController(); to it to associate it going across to another class.

    • deletePartBtn

      actionEvent - button click

    • deleteProductBtn

      public void deleteProductBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is used to delete a Product that the user has selected. It will not delete if the Product has associated parts.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - button click
